backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing income tracking with person management, income entries with timestamps, user profiles, and Internet Identity-based access control (admin/user roles) with automatic admin bootstrapping.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed requirements: adding a prominent login button to DashboardPage.tsx, positioning it in the top-right area, and reusing the existing LoginButton component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the income tracker application with Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for a warm neutral palette with green accents optimized for financial ledger aesthetics.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Spending/Income Tracker application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining three routes (dashboard, admin, income-entry) within a shared AppLayout component with proper TypeScript module augmentation.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout component with sticky header navigation, logo, route-aware active link styling, and footer with Caffeine attribution link.
frontend/src/components/EntriesTable.tsx: Reusable table component displaying income entries with formatted dates/amounts, optional delete actions with confirmation dialogs, loading states, and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states, query cache clearing on logout, and error handling for authentication edge cases.
frontend/src/components/PersonTabs.tsx: A tab navigation component that displays a list of persons as selectable tabs, highlighting the currently selected person and triggering a callback on selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating it with the current identity and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including entries, persons, user profiles, admin status, and income calculations. Includes mutations for creating persons and income entries with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm neutral color scheme with green accents for light and dark modes, including chart colors and design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page for managing persons and entries with authentication checks, bootstrap admin functionality, and CRUD operations including delete confirmations via alert dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard displaying person tabs, income statistics (total, 30-day rolling, entry count), and an entries table with CSV export functionality. Shows loading and empty states appropriately.
frontend/src/pages/IncomeEntryPage.tsx: Income entry form page that requires admin authentication via Internet Identity, allows admins to create income entries with ICP amount, token value, person selection, and date inputs, with validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/utils/adminTokens.ts: Provides admin token configuration by reading from URL parameters or session storage via getSecretParameter, with safe fallback defaults to ensure backend admin bootstrap functionality.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Exports income entries to CSV format with proper field escaping, formatting dates and numbers, and triggering browser download of the generated file.
frontend/src/utils/receivedDate.ts: Validates date inputs (day, month, year) and converts them to backend Time format as nanoseconds since epoch for income entry timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities for sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, custom shadows, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating an Income Tracker web app with existing features for admin login button implementation on the dashboard landing page, with one pending feature request for admin login on landing page.
